Melktert (/ˈmɛlktɛrt/, Afrikaans maka mmiri ara ehi tart) bụ nri South Africa nke ndị Dutch bi na "Cape" (South Africa) mepụtara na mbụ nke nwere ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke nwere ihe a na-etinye na mmiri ara ehi, ntụ ọka, shuga na àkwá. Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mmiri ara ehi na àkwá dị elu karịa na omenala Portuguese custard tart ma ọ bụ Chinese egg tart, na-akpata ọdịdị dị mfe na ụtọ mmiri ara ehi siri ike.

Nri nri a malitere n'etiti ndị bi na Dutch Cape Colony na narị afọ nke iri na asaa, a kwenyere na ọ malitere site na Dutch mattentaart, nri nri nri dị ka cheesecake nke gụnyere n'akwụkwọ nri Een Notabel Boexcken Van Cokeryen (A Notable Book of Cookery) nke Thomas van der Noot bipụtara n'ihe dị ka afọ otu puku, narị ise na iri na anọ (1514) Nchịkọta ụfọdụ na-achọ ka e sie custard n'ime mkpo, ebe ndị ọzọ na-akpọ ka a kwadebe custard tupu oge eruo, wee tinye ya n'ime akpụkpọ ahụ tupu a na-enye ya. A na-awụfụkarị cinnamon n'elu ya, a pụkwara itinye mmiri ara ehi e ji mee custard na osisi cinnamon tupu ịkwadebe ya
Ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ememe ụka na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ, na ihe a na-emekarị na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa South Afrika, enwere ike inye Melktert na oyi ma ọ bụ na okpomọkụ ụlọ, ma ọ bụ obere okpomọkụ.
